title: Vitalik Sells MKR after MakerDAO Eyes Solana’s Codebase
description: Vitalik Buterin sells all of his MKR holdings amidst MakerDAO's new standalone blockchain pivots to Solana.

title: TOKYO BEAST – A Crypto Entertainment Game By Renowned Web3 Companies Announces Launch On Korea Blockchain Week
description: PRESS RELEASE. Tokyo, Japan, September 4th, 2023, Chainwire. TOKYO BEAST FZCO, headquartered in Dubai, United Arab Emirates; General Manager: Tomoe Mizutani; (hereinafter “TOKYO BEAST FZCO”) has announced the crypto entertainment project “TOKYO BEAST, gumi Inc. title: HAKUHODO KEY3, Mazda, and Mitsubishi Estate collaborate to launch web3 hackathon
description: Hakuhodo Inc. is teaming up with Mazda Motor Corporation and Mitsubishi Estate Co. Ltd to announce the Web3 Global Hackathon 2023

title: Cardano: ADA Will Replace BTC and ETH, QUBE To Outperform Them All?
description: With the crypto market no stranger to disruption, two projects are currently creating significant buzz: Cardano (ADA) and InQubeta (QUBE). On the one hand, indicators point towards ADA challenging the dominance of Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH). On the other hand, the innovative QUBE token has also emerged as a contender, seeking to outperform all. [...]

title: Serenity Shield Wins ‘Best Technology Company’ at the Sixth Annual Burj CEO Awards
description:
September 4, 2023 – Paris, France Serenity Shield, a front-runner in technological innovation and disruptive solutions, proudly announces its win for ‘Best Technology Company’ at the illustrious sixth edition of the Burj CEO Awards. The accolade was presented during a grand ceremony aboard a luxurious Norwegian Cruise Lines Mediterranean cruise. The Burj CEO Awards stand […]

title: Sam Bankman-Fried Collected $905,768,503 in Cash Payments From FTX Months Prior To Collapse: Court Filing
description:
Disgraced FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried received close to a billion dollars in cash payments in the months leading up to the bankruptcy of the crypto exchange. A recent court filing shows that Bankman-Fried began to collect millions of dollars in cash payments from FTX as early as January 2022 until October of the same year, […]

The post Sam Bankman-Fried Collected $905,768,503 in Cash Payments From FTX Months Prior To Collapse: Court Filing appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
